question: Who is the first bowler to take 500 wickets in T20 cricket torunaments?
explanation:
West Indies all-rounder Dwayne Bravo has become the first bowler in the world, to take 500 T20 wickets.
The 36-year old former West Indies captain achieved this feat during the CPL match between Trinbago Knight Riders and St Lucia Zouks. He played an integral role in the two World T20 wins of West Indies in 2012 and 2016.
